Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Adaptable \A*dapt"a*ble\, a. Capable of being adapted. [1913 Webster]

adaptable adj : capable of adapting (of becoming or being made suitable) to a particular situation or use; "to succeed one must be adaptable"; "the frame was adaptable to cloth bolts of different widths" [ant: {unadaptable}]
